item.title: About me
item.description: Hi! My name is From February 2022 to September 2022, I am living in Europe üá™üá∫ as a visiting researcher at INESC-TEC/University of Porto! My current research goal is to build üîß more efficient online k-Nearest Neighbor algorithms under a sliding-window regimen. Let’s see how that goes! I love dogs You can e-mail me at saulomastelini@gmail if you want to get in touch ü§ù! This is me at the Louvre museum!
